name: Catch DG
description:
This is a game I made back when I was in school it really is not much. It is a picture of Daizoren Gaming's (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfrEcmUKda-B6PKFO6qVfqQ) old profile pic and it moves around the screen and you just have to click it. It moves faster and faster each time you click it.

This game has no finish and no point system it was the first thing I ever created game wise and also there is no way to make it full screen.

I know it isn't much but I still hope you enjoy it!

Also this is only available for windows.
